conclusion: Determine the change in magnetic flux as the coil rotates 60° downward around the z-axis.
The area of the coil ABCO is 0.4 m², and the magnetic induction intensity is 0.1 T along the positive x-axis.
Calculate initial magnetic flux with angle 90° between area vector and magnetic field.
Initial magnetic flux is 0 Wb using formula Φ = B * A * cos(θ) with θ = 90°.
Calculate final magnetic flux after coil rotates 60°, making angle 30° with magnetic field.
Final magnetic flux is 0.03464 Wb using formula Φ = B * A * cos(30°).
Calculate change in magnetic flux ΔΦ = Φ_f - Φ_i.
Change in magnetic flux is 0.03464 Wb.
